original_title: Antonio el Forgesporáneo: Un documental sobre Forges
overview: Documentary focusing on the figure of the artist Antonio Fraguas "Forges". Throughout the film we get closer to a man who since 1964, year in which he began publishing a daily vignette has continued to populate the Spanish imaginary characters and expressions. Today it is considered an essential of humor in Spain.
title: Antonio el Forgesporáneo: Un documental sobre Forges
